thread.title: 'Are cheques a safer way to pay large sums than electronic bank transfers?'
thread.title_full: 'Are cheques a safer way to pay large sums than electronic bank transfers?'

author: Nicole Blackmore
title: 'Are cheques a safer way to pay large sums than electronic bank transfers?'
text: Mortgages 'Are cheques a safer way to pay large sums than electronic bank transfers?' Ask an expert: We look at whether home buyers can avoid falling victim to conveyancing fraud by using cheques Communication between the conveyancer and their client is more important than the payment method used
